entrypoint.description: Name of the skill to start the loop with. Must exist in the skills map.

max_iterations.description: Maximum number of loop iterations before stopping. Defaults to 100 if omitted.

skills.description: Map of skill names to their definitions.

when.description: Substring to match in the previous skill's summary. If omitted or empty the route always matches (default route).

skill.description: Target skill name to route to or <DONE> to terminate the loop.

model.description: Claude model ID to use for this skill (e.g. claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929).

next.description: Routing rules evaluated top-to-bottom. The first matching route is used.

title: skill-loop
description: Schema for skill-loop YAML configuration files (skill-loop.yml)
